Womens Sugar Peek A Boo Cut Out Pump Black Canvas Flats


If you need to contact the customer service, please do so through eBay messages, not PayPal.

Please note if your size is not listed, then we are permanantly out of stock of that size - sorry!

We offer combined shipping discounts on all orders for just one delivery charge for up to 10 pairs of shoes. All items are sent by Courier.

/
Brand Sugar
Colour Black
RRP £25.00
Buy it now price £8.00
Shipping UK £3.50 [More Options]
Vat Inclusive
SKU 47112003060

At this time we only accept Paypal payments.

We aim to dispatch your order within 2-3 working days, in many cases orders are shipped next working day. Unfortunately we are currently unable to offer a guaranteed next day delivery.

All items are sent by courier. On receipt of the goods a signature will be required.

Where Delivery cost Delivery times from order confirmation
UK £3.50 3-4 days
Ireland £10.00 Within 7 days
European Union £15.00 Within 7-10 days
Rest of the world £25.00 7-14 days


Any taxes or duty fees incurred to ship abroad are the responsibility of the customer and these costs cannot be reclaimed from Office. Please note we do NOT deliver to International PO Boxes.

For European Union, please allow up to 10 working days from confirmation of order for delivery. For Rest of the world please allow up to 14 working days from confirmation of order for delivery.

Our courier will make 2 attempts to deliver a package or leave with a neighbour, should you be unable to collect the package on any of these attempts your order will be returned to us and we will charge again for a redelivery.

RETURNS

If you wish to make a return, you can do so by sending unworn/unused shoes along with your invoice to the address below within 30 days of the invoice date. We'll refund the delivery charge you originally paid on orders if the full order is returned to us within 7 days of receipt. If an order is returned to us after 7 days from receipt, then we'll refund the delivery charge only if the goods are damaged, faulty or incorrect. Always ask for a "Proof of Posting certificate" as we cannot be held responsible for goods that get lost in transit. We recommend shoes are sent back by Recorded or Special Delivery.

OFFICE eBay returns
LOADING BAYS 1-8
GATEHEAD ROAD
MOORFIELD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
KILMARNOCK
KA2 0BA

We recommend you make a new purchase if the item is unsuitable as this is much quicker than exchanging. We can then simply refund the incorrect item. Once your goods are accepted back into stock you will be issued with a refund - usually within 7-10 working days.
We will refund you via PayPal. Returns are not accepted in OFFICE stores.

Please note you do NOT need to contact us to tell us you are returning your shoes. Please allow up to 10 working days before contacting us about your return.

Unfortunately, as all of our stock is listed on eBay we may be unable to offer exchanges on returned items. Please send your goods back to us for a refund and if you want to buy a different size, colour, etc, please make a new purchase. We regret returns can't be accepted in stores or concessions. If we have made a mistake, please contact us via eBay messages so we can sort out the problem immediately.

If the item is faulty or incorrectly dispatched we will be able to offer a refund for the product plus the cost of your return postage.If you think we’ve sent you the wrong thing, please double check the full description of the item on the listing, including the UK size before returning the item to us. We can only reimburse postage / delivery costs where the item is faulty or if we’ve sent the wrong thing. Unfortunately but we can’t take back used goods which are unsuitable or do not fit. This is in addition to, and does not affect your consumer rights.

Don't miss out. Our new HOT deals!

BusinessSellerDetails.TermsAndConditions:
Terms and ConditionsPAYMENT TYPES Office accepts PayPal via the eBay checkout. Our PayPal email address is paypal@office.co.uk.
WEBSITE & STORE PRICES
Making great ranges of shoes available to our customers is a complex business and the on-line side of our business works in a different way to our stores. For these reasons you may sometimes find that products on our Web site are priced differently to those in our stores. Many of the shoes you see on eBay are exclusive to eBay and may not be available in stores.
DELIVERY CHARGES
We aim to dispatch your order within 2-3 working days, in many cases orders are shipped next working day. Unfortunately we are currently unable to offer a guaranteed next day delivery. All items are sent by courier. On receipt of the goods a signature will be required. Where Delivery costDelivery times from order confirmation
UK £3.50 3-4 days Ireland £10.00 7 days European Union £15.00 14 days Rest of the world £25.00 20 days
Any taxes or duty fees incurred to ship abroad are the responsibility of the customer and these costs cannot be reclaimed from Office. For European Union, please allow up to 14 working days from confirmation of order for delivery. For Rest of the world please allow up to 20 working days from confirmation of order for delivery.
How are items delivered? UK: Your items are sent by Home Delivery Network. On receipt of the goods a signature will be required. If nobody is available at the address specified HDNL will attempt to have the parcel signed for and left with a neighbour, a card will be left giving you the location of your goods. Unfortunately we are unable to offer next day delivery.
International: Your items are sent by DPD. On receipt of your products a signature will be required. Our courier will make 3 attempts to deliver a package, should you be unable to collect the package on any of these attempts your order will be returned to us and we will charge again for a redelivery. Delivery address Office can dispatch items to addresses other than the billing address of the cardholder. If you wish to take advantage of this service please add the appropriate details in your eBay and PayPal accounts before checking out. We operate an address verification system (AVS) for your security.
Confirmation of your order Once we have received your order we will send a confirmation e-mail to the email address you provided during the checkout process. Stock availability Once you have confirmed and submitted all the details associated with your order we will send you an email confirming we have received the order. The confirmation email is not a guarantee of stock availability. If we are unable to fulfill your order, we will cancel any unavailable items from your order and do our best to let you know as soon as possible.
Part-cancelled orders You will be refunded for any items that we were either unavailable or cancelled before this time. Heel heights Heel heights are an approximate measurement taken from the inside of the heel and are only a guide.
SIZES All shoes are sold in UK sizes.
STUDENT DISCOUNTS We do not offer a student discount on our web site.
RETURNS
If you wish to make a return, you can do so by sending unworn/unused shoes along with your invoice to the address below within 30 days of the invoice date. We'll refund the delivery charge you originally paid on orders if the full order is returned to us within 7 days of receipt. If an order is returned to us after 7 days from receipt, then we'll refund the delivery charge only if the goods are damaged, faulty or incorrect. Always ask for a "Proof of Posting certificate" as we cannot be held responsible for goods that get lost in transit. We recommend shoes are sent back by Recorded or Special Delivery.
OFFICE eBay returns LOADING BAYS 1-8 GATEHEAD ROAD MOORFIELD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE KILMARNOCK KA2 0BA
We recommend you make a new purchase if the item is unsuitable as this is much quicker than exchanging. We can then simply refund the incorrect item. Once your goods are accepted back into stock you will be issued with a refund - usually within 7-10 working days. We will refund you via PayPal. Returns are not accepted in OFFICE stores. Please note you do NOT need to contact us to tell us you are returning your shoes. Please allow up to 10 working days before contacting us about your return. Unfortunately, as all of our stock is listed on eBay we may be unable to offer exchanges on returned items. Please send your goods back to us for a refund and if you want to buy a different size, colour, etc, please make a new purchase. We regret returns can't be accepted in stores or concessions. If we have made a mistake, please contact us via eBay messages so we can sort out the problem immediately. If the item is faulty or incorrectly dispatched we will be able to offer a refund for the product plus the cost of your return postage.If you think we’ve sent you the wrong thing, please double check the full description of the item on the listing, including the UK size before returning the item to us. We can only reimburse postage / delivery costs where the item is faulty or if we’ve sent the wrong thing. Unfortunately but we can’t take back used goods which are unsuitable or do not fit. This is in addition to, and does not affect your consumer rights.
CANCELLING YOUR ORDER Office try to get our order out as soon as possible, to cancel your order you must email us via eBay Messages. Unfortunately it will not always be possible to stop the order if this has already been picked up by the delivery company so Office will not be liable for the postage and packaging costs should this be the case
GENERAL Office reserves the right to refuse any order if we discover there is a quality control issue with your order.
Data protection We do not share any data collected via our website with any 3rd party partners

ReturnPolicy.Description:
Returns
If you wish to make a return, you can do so by sending unworn/unused shoes along with your invoice to the address below within 30 days of the invoice date. We'll refund the delivery charge you originally paid on orders if the full order is returned to us within 7 days of receipt. If an order is returned to us after 7 days from receipt, then we'll refund the delivery charge only if the goods are damaged, faulty or incorrect.
Always ask for a "Proof of Posting certificate" as we cannot be held responsible for goods that get lost in transit. We recommend shoes are sent back by Recorded or Special Delivery.
OFFICE eBay returns LOADING BAYS 1-8 GATEHEAD ROAD MOORFIELD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE KILMARNOCK KA2 0BA
We recommend you make a new purchase if the item is unsuitable as this is much quicker than exchanging. We can then simply refund the incorrect item. Once your goods are accepted back into stock you will be issued with an exchange or refund - usually within 7-10 working days.
We will refund you via PayPal. Returns are not accepted in OFFICE stores.
Please note you do NOT need to contact us to tell us you are returning your shoes.
Unfortunately, as all of our stock is listed on eBay we are currently unable to offer exchanges on returned items. Please send your goods back to us for a refund. If you want to buy a different size, colour, etc, please make a new purchase.
We regret returns can't be accepted in stores or concessions.
If we have made a mistake, please contact us via eBay messages so we can sort out the problem immediately.
If the item is faulty or incorrectly dispatched we will be able to offer a refund for the product plus the cost of your return postage. If you think we’ve sent you the wrong thing, please double check the full description of the item on the listing, including the UK size before returning the item to us. We can only reimburse postage / delivery costs where the item is faulty or if we’ve sent the wrong thing.
Unfortunately but we can’t take back used goods which are unsuitable or do not fit. This is in addition to, and does not affect your consumer rights.
